name: Out of Bounds (TobiasRusjan)
description:
Out of Bounds is a first person shooter platformer. Try to package your own game by finding and compiling blueprints, meshes, textures and sound effects. But watch out for the bugs!

The entire game was created by solo developer Tobias Rusjan during a 7 days period of the Epic Megajam 2021 "Running out of space". Only the music played in the game was outsourced, the song and artist are listed below:

Erdfall by Kraftamt:  http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/Karstenholymoly/61277
